Articles.Content:
Based on this guide for changing emissions here, I was wondering how I would go about adding multiple emissive  animations like this together.

 

Figured it out by actually watching the video in the very tutorial I already saw but somehow missed the exact part I was looking for in....

 

Get different animations selected after making them following said guide. Right click, Animation, Compile 

Edited December 12, 2017 by USB4
Figured it out.
